name: test-erp-bns
description: ERP system with Angular frontend and Next.js backend

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && ng build --configuration production
scripts.build:backend: cd backend/test && npm install && npm run build
scripts.deploy:hosting: npm run build:frontend && firebase deploy --only hosting
scripts.deploy:functions: npm run build:backend && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend/test && npm install
